Option Name: Detailed Example: Spa, 1000 kWh/yr Pump, 1300 kWh/yr Electric Resistance Heater
Detailed Example: Spa, 1000 kWh/yr Pump, 1300 kWh/yr Electric Resistance Heater, 90% Usage Multiplier
Detailed Example: Spa, 1000 kWh/yr Pump, 260 kWh/yr Heat Pump Heater
Pump Annual Energy Use: The annual energy consumption of the spa.
Pump Usage Multiplier: Multiplier on the spa pump energy usage that can reflect, e.g., high/low usage occupants.
Heater Type: The type of spa heater.
Heater Annual Electricity Use: The annual electricity consumption of the spa heater.
Heater Annual Natural Gas Use: The annual natural gas consumption of the spa heater.
Heater Usage Multiplier: Multiplier on the spa heater energy usage that can reflect, e.g., high/low usage occupants.
